interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: UNGLINGA Black Mask Blackhead Remover Purifying Peel Off Mask Bamboo Activated Charcoal Face Deep Pore Cleansing Mask For Face Nose and Acne Blemishes Treatment Review Date: 2015/09/14 Store: UNGLINGA Product Description: ['CONCERNS: Enlarged pore, Blackheads, Anti-aging, Fine lines and blemishes, Oily skin, Strawberry nose. Effect: Absorbent pores of blackheads and stubborn dirt, shrink pores, regulate oil secretion. How to use： Step 1 : Wash your face with warm water and cover it with a hot towel to open the pores . Step 2 : Spread the Blackhead remover mask gently on your face and wait 10-15 for it to dry. Step 3 : Peel off the black mask gently from chin to forehead . Step 4 : Rains with cold water and you may apply your daily skin care products afterwards. Tips: 1.The Blackhead Mask is only used for removing blackheads, exfoliating and cleaning the skin. 2.No effective against acne. Don’t use it on your acne or inflamed areas. 3.Spread the Blackhead Mask slowly in the same direction on your face and don’t stay on the same area too long. 4. Please ensure that you are not allergic. 5. If there is any discomfort, stop using. Package Included: 1 * Blackhead remover mask Gender: Unisex Net weight: 60g Shelf life: 3 years Ingredients: WATER, PROPANEDIOL, KAOLIN, POLYVINYLALCOHOL CROSSPOLYMER, POLYVINYL ALCOHOL, RUBBER LATEX, AMMONIUM GLYCOLATE, IMIDAZOLIDINYL UREA, AROMA'] Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.9 x 3 x 2.9 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '712038120383 777269135650 646437061445 646437182287', 'Manufacturer': 'KoEily'} Review Text: No one tells you when you are young that your face will break out even as an adult. Especially when things are stressful or it's just that time of the month. I had some friends tell me that mud masks are especially helpful for this, but that they are also good for exfoliating and keeping skin healthy. I tried using some bentonite clay as it says you can use it as a mud mask, but it ended up clumpy and hard to spread on my face. I always ended up making too much too, which only wasted it. It was too much trouble and I stopped using it. I decided to give the dead sea mud mask a go. It is much darker than I expected, my entire face was blue/grey. It's very easy to spread on, I just used one finger and small swisp on each section of my face. It doesn't take too much, I figured it would take a big scoop, but really it took much less. I have used it three times already, each before bed, and you can't even see a dent in how much was in the jar. I left it on about 10 minutes each time and then wiped it off with a wet wash cloth. My skin feels softer, is not breaking out, and my husband even noticed a difference.

*I RECEIVED THIS PRODUCT TO TRY IN EXCHANGE FOR AN HONEST AND UNBIASED REVIEW. THIS DOES NOT GUARANTEE A GOOD REVIEW, SO IF I GIVE THE PRODUCT ONE, IT MEANS I TRULY BELIEVE IT DESERVES IT. EVERYTHING IN THIS REVIEW IS 100% MY OWN AND HAS NOT BEEN INFLUENCED OR ALTERED IN ANY WAY Review Title: Forget mixing up a powder, this is so much better than that Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Detangling Brush Pink Hair Brush For Women Best Detangler for Adults and Kids - HAIR GLIDER Hair Glider ['The HAIR GLIDER is the ultimate detangler brush. This specially designed hairbrush glides through the toughest snarls. This features 2 levels of bristles designed to tease out knots with each stroke. Whether detangling adult hair or kids rushing to school this is sure to cut down on time and snags. When this arrives on your doorstep, simply tear open the Amazon box and see for yourself what all the rave reviews are about. With our 100% no hassle return policy consider ordering extra for family members, travel or as a gift.'] {'Brand': 'Hair Glider', 'Hair Type': 'Oily, Dry, Normal', 'Color': 'Peach', 'Model Name': 'Part.no', 'Item Weight': '0.2 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 2 x 1 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SPX8FL009-AF11', 'UPC': '755464306846', 'Manufacturer': 'Saprex'} I have very thick hair, for a long time I had a mat of tangles at the base of my skull that used to take me up to an hour to detangle. My hair was getting unmanageable so I cut it off. After donating 4 pony tails to locks of love, as my hair reached all the way down to my knees when I was standing up, I thought my hair would be easy to care for. But if I'm not careful, I still get very bad tangles in my short hair. Now that I am starting to grow it out again, I thought my troubles would be back, but I received an opportunity to try this brush at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest, unbiased, review. (all opinions are my own) I took my hair down from it's ponytail and ran the brush through, figuring it would get caught fairly quickly. To my surprise, it didn't really snag at all. It actually did as it claimed. My hair was smooth and the spot at the base of my skull that always gets missed no matter how hard I try, was also smooth and untangled. I am really shocked. I have tried so many brushes for myself and had sort of given up on finding something just for me. I will be keeping my brush in a safe place so my kids don't lose it and recommending to all of my friends. I am very happy with this purchase and would buy it again. It is worth the money. It actually detangled my extremely thick hair UNGLINGA Black Mask Blackhead Remover Purifying Peel Off Mask Bamboo Activated Charcoal Face Deep Pore Cleansing Mask For Face Nose and Acne Blemishes Treatment UNGLINGA ['CONCERNS: Enlarged pore, Blackheads, Anti-aging, Fine lines and blemishes, Oily skin, Strawberry nose. Step 2 : Spread the Blackhead remover mask gently on your face and wait 10-15 for it to dry. Step 3 : Peel off the black mask gently from chin to forehead . Step 4 : Rains with cold water and you may apply your daily skin care products afterwards. Tips: 1.The Blackhead Mask is only used for removing blackheads, exfoliating and cleaning the skin. 2.No effective against acne. Don’t use it on your acne or inflamed areas. 3.Spread the Blackhead Mask slowly in the same direction on your face and don’t stay on the same area too long. 4. Please ensure that you are not allergic. 5. If there is any discomfort, stop using. Package Included: 1 * Blackhead remover mask Gender: Unisex Net weight: 60g Shelf life: 3 years Ingredients: WATER, PROPANEDIOL, KAOLIN, POLYVINYLALCOHOL CROSSPOLYMER, POLYVINYL ALCOHOL, RUBBER LATEX, AMMONIUM GLYCOLATE, IMIDAZOLIDINYL UREA, AROMA'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.9 x 3 x 2.9 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '712038120383 777269135650 646437061445 646437182287', 'Manufacturer': 'KoEily'} No one tells you when you are young that your face will break out even as an adult. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Needs:** User has very thick hair and experiences significant tangling issues, highlighting a strong need for effective detangling solutions.
- **Preference for Functionality:** They prioritize products that deliver genuine results, with a particular focus on detangling capabilities and overall hair health.
- **Positive Product Experience:** User finds detangling tools satisfactory, appreciating their effectiveness in addressing hair challenges, which enhances their trust in functional hair tools.
- **Willingness to Recommend:** They tend to share positive product experiences with friends, indicating a social aspect to their purchasing decisions and a desire to support others in finding effective solutions.
- **Commitment to Quality:** User is inclined to invest in high-quality products perceived as effective, even at higher price points, suggesting a strong value for quality over cost considerations.
- **Family-Oriented:** Their considerations extend to family needs, as seen with their careful choices about hair care tools around children.
- **Skincare Enthusiast:** Recently, the user expressed interest in skincare by trying a blackhead remover mask, indicating a growing commitment to maintaining facial health and addressing adult skin concerns. They value ease of use in skincare products, favoring those that are practical and effective.

Overall, this user's profile indicates a strong commitment to high-quality hair and skincare products, valuing functional effectiveness and communicating positive experiences within their social circles.
